decision_conditions: <p style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; text-align:justify"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Following the installation of the proposed noise mitigation measures detailed within the applicant updated Noise Impact Report 21739 and before the use hereby permitted is brought into operations, a noise verification report shall be submitted to and agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The submitted noise verification report shall demonstrate that noise exposure levels from the operation of the x2 AC units and x2 ASHP following the installation of the proposed noise mitigation measures would be reasonably in accordance with projected noise levels detailed within the applicant updated Noise Impact Report 21739.</span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; text-align:justify"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">The noise verification report shall identify the highest possible total /cumulative noise levels generated through the use of the x2 AC units and the x2 ASHP, and this shall be calculated in respect to the closest noise sensitive receptors. The mitigation measures must ensure noise emanating from the units accords with BS4142:14.</span></span></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; text-align:justify"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span arial="">The development hereby permitted shall be </span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span arial="">retained</span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span arial=""> in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: </span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; text-align:justify"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Location Plan, 055_A-095 rev 03, PHOTOS, 055_A-211 rev 09, 055_A-211 rev 08, 055_A-212 rev 00</span></span></p>
description: installation of two external Air Source Heat Pumps and two external Air Conditioning units (retrospective)
